item.title: Ivan add a quote by Umberto Eco
item.description: "Dios ha muerto, el arte dejÃ³ de existir, la historia ha llegado a su fin, y yo mismo no me siento del todo bien." -- Umberto Eco

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Poetry is what gets lost in translation." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Yevgeny Yevtushenko
item.description: "A poet's autobiography is his poetry. Anything else is just a footnote." -- Yevgeny Yevtushenko

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Ivan add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "Do I dare Disturb the universe? In a minute there is time For decisions and revisions which a minute will reverse." -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "A good poem is a contribution to reality. The world is never the same once a good poem has been added to it. A good poem helps to change the shape of the universe, helps to extend everyone's knowledge of himself and the world around him." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Salman Rushdie
item.description: "A poet's work . . . to name the unnamable, to point at frauds, to take sides, start arguments, shape the world and stop it from going to sleep." -- Salman Rushdie

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Derek Walcott
item.description: "I read; I travel; I become" -- Derek Walcott

item.title: Ivan add a quote by Clarice Lispector
item.description: "Haber nacido me ha estropeado la salud." -- Clarice Lispector
